6 import os
7 import pathlib
8 import pickle
9 from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QFileDialog, QApplication
10 
11 
17 def openDialog(folder_path, file_ext):
18  if not os.path.isdir(folder_path):
19  folder_path = os.getcwd()
20  options = QFileDialog.Options()
21  options |= QFileDialog.DontUseNativeDialog
22  fname, _ = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(
23  parent = None,
24  caption = 'Open file',
25  directory = folder_path,
26  filter = file_ext,
27  options = options)
28  return fname
29 
30 
37 def saveDialog(folder_path, file_ext):
38  if not os.path.isdir(folder_path):
39  folder_path = os.getcwd()
40  options = QFileDialog.Options()
41  options |= QFileDialog.DontUseNativeDialog
42  fname, _ = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(
43  parent = None,
44  caption = 'Save file',
45  directory = folder_path,
46  filter = file_ext,
47  options = options)
48 
49  overwrite = False
50  if fname != "":
51  _, ext = os.path.splitext(fname)
52  _, ext_ = os.path.splitext(file_ext)
53  if ext == ext_:
54  overwrite = True
55  else:
56  fname = fname + ext_
57  return fname, overwrite
58 
59 
66 def loadData(file_path=None):
67  if file_path is None:
68  file_path = openDialog(os.getcwd(), '*.pickle')
69  if not os.path.isfile(file_path):
70  print("[loadData] wrong file path : {0}".format(file_path))
71  return None
72  try:
73  with open(file_path, 'rb') as f:
74  data = pickle.load(f)
75  print("[loadData] load file : {0}".format(file_path))
76  return data
77  except Exception as e:
78  print("[loadData] {0}".format(e))
79  return None
80 
81 
88 def saveData(data, file_path=None, overwrite=False):
89  if not os.path.isfile(file_path):
90  init_path = file_path if os.path.isdir(file_path) else os.getcwd()
91  file_path, overwrite = saveDialog(init_path, '*.pickle')
92  if os.path.isfile(file_path) and (overwrite == False):
93  print("[saveData] file is already exists : {0}".format(file_path))
94  return False
95  folder_path = os.path.dirname(file_path)
96  if not os.path.isdir(folder_path):
97  print("[saveData] wrong directory: {0}".format(file_path))
98  return False
99  try:
100  with open(file_path, 'wb') as f:
101  pickle.dump(data, f)
102  print("[saveData] {0}".format(file_path))
103  return True
104  except Exception as e:
105  print("[saveData] {0}".format(e))
106  return False

114 def get_file_list(file_path, file_ext):
115  p_path = pathlib.Path(file_path)
116  files = p_path.glob(file_ext)
117  file_names = [p.absolute() for p in files if p.is_file()]
118  return file_names
